column5: Need help in finding a professional installer to install a minnkota bowmount trolling motor to my bayliner boat. Please let me know of any recommendation. Thank you.

Mount the motor as close to the "nose" of the bow as possible!... following the mounting instructions would be good!!!  ... keep the "shaft" of the tolling motor parallel to the port or starbord sides of the boat when stowed!   ... maybe this will help eh?
Grant Mills is in Pickering on Brock rd s.  Garnet
Might make it easier for folks to recommend an installer if you told us where you live  Ontario's a pretty BIG place
Contact Bayliner. They used to make a contoured Aluminum bracket for the Bow. I have one on my 2000 model 1804 Fish n' Ski. Cheers Ted
Yep.. like Ted says you're gonna need the factory.. or custom bracket like I had on my Glastron.
Thanks all for your help.  Sorry, I did not mentioned that I am located in Whitby, Ontario. Will post picture once I have the unit installed.
Grant is behind Tightlines. Does fishfinders trolling motors any kind of rigging on boats, metal fab.  Garnet
Wayne, I think that you should change your avitar to this!!!!!
